main event: A civilian observer in Fairborn, Ohio reported seeing a large, round, brilliant blue-white object on radar from approximately 10:30 PM to 11:00 PM on May 2, 1962.
interesting points: The object moved from one point to another in the sky, stopped, and then moved again.
The object was quite large and round.
The observer reported that the radar showed the object was real, although it may not have actually been physically present.
The report also includes a separate sighting on May 1, 1962 of a bright bluish-green round object that gave off sparks and looked like a falling star.
sighted object: a large, round, brilliant blue-white object
